explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper uses soft subspace clustering method, which is a type of unsupervised learning technique.
explanations.clustering: The paper explicitly mentions using soft subspace clustering method for fuzzy feature weighted clustering.
explanations.principal components analysis: The paper uses independent component analysis (ICA) technology, which is related to principal components analysis (PCA) as both are dimensionality reduction techniques.
explanations.feature learning: The paper discusses building time series feature subspace and fuzzy feature weighted clustering, which involve feature learning.
explanations.feature representation: The paper converts high dimensional dynamic time series into static data, which involves feature representation.
